Hi.. i noe the pics were suppose to be up like few days ago but u see the thing is i left my USB cable at my granny's so cannot upload.. sigh.. anyway, now that its here, feel free to comment ya.. :)

Yo peeps! wazzup?! Youth camp 2004 was amazing! The pastor was so way cool. He totally connect with the youth! And the place was super cool, literally... u noe la up there in Genting, well actually we were in Peacehaven . So here are a couple of pics for u guys to enjoy...
